issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Race in localization can cause containers to fail

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: LocalDistributedCacheManager uses FSDownload which is changing in YARN-112. Need to fix it.

comments.body: MR part of the patch from YARN-112.

Jenkins already ran this as part of YARN-112.

I just committed this to trunk and branch-2 along with YARN-112.

Integrated in Hadoop-trunk-Commit #3584 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/3584/])
    YARN-112. Fixed a race condition during localization that fails containers. Contributed by Omkar Vinit Joshi.
MAPREDUCE-5138. Fix LocalDistributedCacheManager after YARN-112. Contributed by Omkar Vinit Joshi. (Revision 1466196)

     Result = SUCCESS
